outcomes.title: Line Slopes
outcomes.description: Identify the slope of a line from its equation.

exercises.pretext:
For each of the following line equations, identify its slope.

  1. -2 \, x + y = 7
  2. y = -3 \, x - 4
  1. \frac{1}{2}
  2. -3
exercises.html:
For each of the following line equations, identify its slope.

  1. \(-2 \, x + y = 7\)
  2. \(y = -3 \, x - 4\)

Answer:

  1. \(\frac{1}{2}\)
  2. \(-3\)

exercises.pretext:
Identify the slope for each of the following line equations.

  1. y = -7 \, x - 5
  2. -6 \, x + 7 \, y = \left(-8\right)
  1. -7
  2. \frac{7}{6}
exercises.html:
Identify the slope for each of the following line equations.

  1. \(y = -7 \, x - 5\)
  2. \(-6 \, x + 7 \, y = \left(-8\right)\)

Answer:

  1. \(-7\)
  2. \(\frac{7}{6}\)

exercises.pretext:

  2. \(-8 \, x + 3 \, y = 0\)

Answer:

  1. \(3\)

outcomes.title: Product Rule
outcomes.description: Apply the product rule to take derivatives

exercises.pretext:
Explain how to find the derivative f'(x).

f(x)=-4 \, \cos\left(x\right) e^{x} f'(x)=-4 \, \cos\left(x\right) e^{x} + 4 \, e^{x} \sin\left(x\right)
exercises.html:
Explain how to find the derivative \(f'(x)\).

\[ f(x)=-4 \, \cos\left(x\right) e^{x} \]

Answer:

\[ f'(x)=-4 \, \cos\left(x\right) e^{x} + 4 \, e^{x} \sin\left(x\right) \]

exercises.pretext:
Explain how to find the derivative f'(x).

f(x)=-3 \, x^{7} \cos\left(x\right) f'(x)=3 \, x^{7} \sin\left(x\right) - 21 \, x^{6} \cos\left(x\right)
exercises.html:
Explain how to find the derivative \(f'(x)\).

\[ f(x)=-3 \, x^{7} \cos\left(x\right) \]

Answer:

\[ f'(x)=3 \, x^{7} \sin\left(x\right) - 21 \, x^{6} \cos\left(x\right) \]

exercises.pretext:
Explain how to find the rate of change f'(x).

f(x)=-4 \, \cos\left(x\right) \log\left(x\right) f'(x)=4 \, \log\left(x\right) \sin\left(x\right) - \frac{4 \, \cos\left(x\right)}{x}
exercises.html:
Explain how to find the rate of change \(f'(x)\).

\[ f(x)=-4 \, \cos\left(x\right) \log\left(x\right) \]

Answer:

\[ f'(x)=4 \, \log\left(x\right) \sin\left(x\right) - \frac{4 \, \cos\left(x\right)}{x} \]

f(x)=2 \, e^{x} \log\left(x\right) f'(x)=2 \, e^{x} \log\left(x\right) + \frac{2 \, e^{x}}{x}
exercises.html:
Explain how to find the derivative \(f'(x)\).

\[ f(x)=2 \, e^{x} \log\left(x\right) \]

Answer:

\[ f'(x)=2 \, e^{x} \log\left(x\right) + \frac{2 \, e^{x}}{x} \]

exercises.pretext:
Explain how to find the rate of change f'(x).

f(x)=2 \, x^{5} \cos\left(x\right) f'(x)=-2 \, x^{5} \sin\left(x\right) + 10 \, x^{4} \cos\left(x\right)
exercises.html:
Explain how to find the rate of change \(f'(x)\).

\[ f(x)=2 \, x^{5} \cos\left(x\right) \]

Answer:

\[ f'(x)=-2 \, x^{5} \sin\left(x\right) + 10 \, x^{4} \cos\left(x\right) \]

exercises.pretext:
Explain how to find the derivative f'(x).

f(x)=2 \, x^{9} \cos\left(x\right) f'(x)=-2 \, x^{9} \sin\left(x\right) + 18 \, x^{8} \cos\left(x\right)
exercises.html:
Explain how to find the derivative \(f'(x)\).

\[ f(x)=2 \, x^{9} \cos\left(x\right) \]

Answer:

\[ f'(x)=-2 \, x^{9} \sin\left(x\right) + 18 \, x^{8} \cos\left(x\right) \]

exercises.pretext:

f(x)=4 \, e^{x} \sin\left(x\right) f'(x)=4 \, \cos\left(x\right) e^{x} + 4 \, e^{x} \sin\left(x\right)

Explain how to find the derivative \(f'(x)\).

f(x)=-2 \, \cos\left(x\right) e^{x} f'(x)=-2 \, \cos\left(x\right) e^{x} + 2 \, e^{x} \sin\left(x\right)
exercises.html:
Explain how to find the rate of change \(f'(x)\).

\[ f(x)=-2 \, \cos\left(x\right) e^{x} \]

Answer:

\[ f'(x)=-2 \, \cos\left(x\right) e^{x} + 2 \, e^{x} \sin\left(x\right) \]

exercises.pretext:
Explain how to find the rate of change f'(x).

f(x)=-2 \, \log\left(x\right) \sin\left(x\right) f'(x)=-2 \, \cos\left(x\right) \log\left(x\right) - \frac{2 \, \sin\left(x\right)}{x}
exercises.html:
Explain how to find the rate of change \(f'(x)\).

\[ f(x)=-2 \, \log\left(x\right) \sin\left(x\right) \]

Answer:

\[ f'(x)=-2 \, \cos\left(x\right) \log\left(x\right) - \frac{2 \, \sin\left(x\right)}{x} \]

exercises.pretext:

f(x)=-4 \, e^{x} \log\left(x\right) f'(x)=-4 \, e^{x} \log\left(x\right) - \frac{4 \, e^{x}}{x}
exercises.html:
Explain how to find the derivative \(f'(x)\).

\[ f(x)=-4 \, e^{x} \log\left(x\right) \]

Answer:

\[ f'(x)=-4 \, e^{x} \log\left(x\right) - \frac{4 \, e^{x}}{x} \]

exercises.pretext:
Explain how to find the rate of change f'(x).

f(x)=-4 \, \cos\left(x\right) \log\left(x\right) f'(x)=4 \, \log\left(x\right) \sin\left(x\right) - \frac{4 \, \cos\left(x\right)}{x}
exercises.html:
Explain how to find the rate of change \(f'(x)\).

\[ f(x)=-4 \, \cos\left(x\right) \log\left(x\right) \]

Answer:

\[ f'(x)=4 \, \log\left(x\right) \sin\left(x\right) - \frac{4 \, \cos\left(x\right)}{x} \]

exercises.pretext:
Explain how to find the derivative f'(x).

f(x)=3 \, \cos\left(x\right) \sin\left(x\right) f'(x)=3 \, \cos\left(x\right)^{2} - 3 \, \sin\left(x\right)^{2}
exercises.html:
Explain how to find the derivative \(f'(x)\).

\[ f(x)=3 \, \cos\left(x\right) \sin\left(x\right) \]

Answer:

\[ f'(x)=3 \, \cos\left(x\right)^{2} - 3 \, \sin\left(x\right)^{2} \]

exercises.pretext:
Explain how to find the derivative f'(x).

f(x)=4 \, \cos\left(x\right) e^{x} f'(x)=4 \, \cos\left(x\right) e^{x} - 4 \, e^{x} \sin\left(x\right)

Explain how to find the derivative \(f'(x)\).

\[ f(x)=4 \, \cos\left(x\right) e^{x} \]

Answer:

\[ f'(x)=4 \, \cos\left(x\right) e^{x} - 4 \, e^{x} \sin\left(x\right) \]

exercises.pretext:

outcomes.title: Matrix Example
outcomes.description: Write equivalent matrices, linear systems, and vector equations.

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} 4 \, x_{1} & + & 4 \, x_{2} & + & 3 \, x_{3} & + & 18 \, x_{4} & = & -11 \\ -3 \, x_{1} & - & 3 \, x_{2} & + & x_{3} & - & 7 \, x_{4} & = & 5 \\ 3 \, x_{1} & + & 3 \, x_{2} & + & 3 \, x_{3} & + & 15 \, x_{4} & = & -9 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} 4 & 4 & 3 & 18 & -11 \\ -3 & -3 & 1 & -7 & 5 \\ 3 & 3 & 3 & 15 & -9 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} 4 \, x_{1} & + & 4 \, x_{2} & + & 3 \, x_{3} & + & 18 \, x_{4} & = & -11 \\ -3 \, x_{1} & - & 3 \, x_{2} & + & x_{3} & - & 7 \, x_{4} & = & 5 \\ 3 \, x_{1} & + & 3 \, x_{2} & + & 3 \, x_{3} & + & 15 \, x_{4} & = & -9 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} 4 & 4 & 3 & 18 & -11 \\ -3 & -3 & 1 & -7 & 5 \\ 3 & 3 & 3 & 15 & -9 \end{array}\right)\]

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} -3 \, x_{1} & - & x_{2} & + & 7 \, x_{3} & = & 4 \\ -3 \, x_{1} & - & 5 \, x_{2} & - & x_{3} & = & -4 \\ 4 \, x_{1} & + & 3 \, x_{2} & - & 6 \, x_{3} & = & -2 \\ -x_{1} & - & x_{2} & + & x_{3} & = & 0 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} -3 & -1 & 7 & 4 \\ -3 & -5 & -1 & -4 \\ 4 & 3 & -6 & -2 \\ -1 & -1 & 1 & 0 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} -3 \, x_{1} & - & x_{2} & + & 7 \, x_{3} & = & 4 \\ -3 \, x_{1} & - & 5 \, x_{2} & - & x_{3} & = & -4 \\ 4 \, x_{1} & + & 3 \, x_{2} & - & 6 \, x_{3} & = & -2 \\ -x_{1} & - & x_{2} & + & x_{3} & = & 0 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} -3 & -1 & 7 & 4 \\ -3 & -5 & -1 & -4 \\ 4 & 3 & -6 & -2 \\ -1 & -1 & 1 & 0 \end{array}\right)\]

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} -5 \, x_{1} & - & 3 \, x_{2} & + & 18 \, x_{3} & = & -14 \\ -3 \, x_{1} & - & 2 \, x_{2} & + & 11 \, x_{3} & = & -9 \\ -x_{1} & + & 3 \, x_{2} & & & = & 8 \\ & - & x_{2} & + & x_{3} & = & -3 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} -5 & -3 & 18 & -14 \\ -3 & -2 & 11 & -9 \\ -1 & 3 & 0 & 8 \\ 0 & -1 & 1 & -3 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} -5 \, x_{1} & - & 3 \, x_{2} & + & 18 \, x_{3} & = & -14 \\ -3 \, x_{1} & - & 2 \, x_{2} & + & 11 \, x_{3} & = & -9 \\ -x_{1} & + & 3 \, x_{2} & & & = & 8 \\ & - & x_{2} & + & x_{3} & = & -3 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} -5 & -3 & 18 & -14 \\ -3 & -2 & 11 & -9 \\ -1 & 3 & 0 & 8 \\ 0 & -1 & 1 & -3 \end{array}\right)\]

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} x & - & y & + & 4 \, z & = & 4 \\ 2 \, x & - & y & + & 4 \, z & = & 7 \\ & - & y & + & 5 \, z & = & 1 \\ & & & - & 2 \, z & = & 0 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} 1 & -1 & 4 & 4 \\ 2 & -1 & 4 & 7 \\ 0 & -1 & 5 & 1 \\ 0 & 0 & -2 & 0 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} x & - & y & + & 4 \, z & = & 4 \\ 2 \, x & - & y & + & 4 \, z & = & 7 \\ & - & y & + & 5 \, z & = & 1 \\ & & & - & 2 \, z & = & 0 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} 1 & -1 & 4 & 4 \\ 2 & -1 & 4 & 7 \\ 0 & -1 & 5 & 1 \\ 0 & 0 & -2 & 0 \end{array}\right)\]

\begin{matrix} x_{1} & - & x_{2} & & & = & 5 \\ 5 \, x_{1} & - & 4 \, x_{2} & - & 4 \, x_{3} & = & 18 \\ 4 \, x_{1} & - & 3 \, x_{2} & - & 3 \, x_{3} & = & 14 \\ -5 \, x_{1} & + & 5 \, x_{2} & - & x_{3} & = & -26 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} 1 & -1 & 0 & 5 \\ 5 & -4 & -4 & 18 \\ 4 & -3 & -3 & 14 \\ -5 & 5 & -1 & -26 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} x_{1} & - & x_{2} & & & = & 5 \\ 5 \, x_{1} & - & 4 \, x_{2} & - & 4 \, x_{3} & = & 18 \\ 4 \, x_{1} & - & 3 \, x_{2} & - & 3 \, x_{3} & = & 14 \\ -5 \, x_{1} & + & 5 \, x_{2} & - & x_{3} & = & -26 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} 1 & -1 & 0 & 5 \\ 5 & -4 & -4 & 18 \\ 4 & -3 & -3 & 14 \\ -5 & 5 & -1 & -26 \end{array}\right)\]

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} 3 \, x & + & 9 \, y & - & 3 \, z & + & 5 \, {w} & = & -4 \\ -x & - & 3 \, y & + & z & - & 4 \, {w} & = & -1 \\ x & + & 3 \, y & - & z & & & = & -3 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} 3 & 9 & -3 & 5 & -4 \\ -1 & -3 & 1 & -4 & -1 \\ 1 & 3 & -1 & 0 & -3 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} 3 \, x & + & 9 \, y & - & 3 \, z & + & 5 \, {w} & = & -4 \\ -x & - & 3 \, y & + & z & - & 4 \, {w} & = & -1 \\ x & + & 3 \, y & - & z & & & = & -3 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} 3 & 9 & -3 & 5 & -4 \\ -1 & -3 & 1 & -4 & -1 \\ 1 & 3 & -1 & 0 & -3 \end{array}\right)\]

exercises.pretext:

exercises.pretext:

exercises.pretext:

\begin{matrix} x_{1} & - & 2 \, x_{2} & - & x_{3} & = & 0 \\ -2 \, x_{1} & + & 4 \, x_{2} & + & 3 \, x_{3} & = & 4 \\ -3 \, x_{1} & + & 6 \, x_{2} & + & 2 \, x_{3} & = & -3 \\ -3 \, x_{1} & + & 6 \, x_{2} & + & 2 \, x_{3} & = & -2 \\ \end{matrix}

exercises.pretext:

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} 2 \, x_{1} & - & 4 \, x_{2} & + & 2 \, x_{3} & = & -5 \\ -x_{1} & + & 2 \, x_{2} & - & x_{3} & = & 5 \\ -x_{1} & + & 2 \, x_{2} & - & x_{3} & = & 1 \\ -x_{1} & + & 2 \, x_{2} & - & x_{3} & = & -1 \\ \end{matrix}

exercises.pretext:

exercises.pretext:

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} -2 \, x & + & 2 \, y & - & 5 \, z & = & 5 \\ & & y & - & 5 \, z & = & 2 \\ -x & + & y & - & 3 \, z & = & 3 \\ -2 \, x & + & y & - & 5 \, z & = & 8 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} -2 & 2 & -5 & 5 \\ 0 & 1 & -5 & 2 \\ -1 & 1 & -3 & 3 \\ -2 & 1 & -5 & 8 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} -2 & 2 & -5 & 5 \\ 0 & 1 & -5 & 2 \\ -1 & 1 & -3 & 3 \\ -2 & 1 & -5 & 8 \end{array}\right)\]

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} x_{1} & + & 2 \, x_{2} & - & 3 \, x_{3} & + & 3 \, x_{4} & = & 4 \\ & & & & & & 0 & = & 1 \\ 2 \, x_{1} & + & 4 \, x_{2} & - & 6 \, x_{3} & + & 6 \, x_{4} & = & 4 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} 1 & 2 & -3 & 3 & 4 \\ 0 & 0 & 0 & 0 & 1 \\ 2 & 4 & -6 & 6 & 4 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} x_{1} & + & 2 \, x_{2} & - & 3 \, x_{3} & + & 3 \, x_{4} & = & 4 \\ & & & & & & 0 & = & 1 \\ 2 \, x_{1} & + & 4 \, x_{2} & - & 6 \, x_{3} & + & 6 \, x_{4} & = & 4 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} 1 & 2 & -3 & 3 & 4 \\ 0 & 0 & 0 & 0 & 1 \\ 2 & 4 & -6 & 6 & 4 \end{array}\right)\]

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} -x_{1} & - & x_{2} & + & 3 \, x_{3} & + & x_{4} & = & 6 \\ & & & & x_{3} & + & x_{4} & = & 1 \\ -x_{1} & - & x_{2} & - & x_{3} & - & 3 \, x_{4} & = & 2 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} -1 & -1 & 3 & 1 & 6 \\ 0 & 0 & 1 & 1 & 1 \\ -1 & -1 & -1 & -3 & 2 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

Answer:

exercises.pretext:

 \left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} -1 & 2 & 5 & 3 & -13 \\ 2 & -5 & -11 & -5 & 25 \\ 0 & 5 & 5 & -4 & 2 \end{array}\right)

exercises.pretext:

exercises.pretext:

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} 1 & -3 & -4 & 5 \\ -1 & 3 & 5 & -7 \\ 0 & 0 & 4 & -8 \\ 1 & -3 & -2 & 1 \end{array}\right)

exercises.pretext:

Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} x_{1} & & & - & 2 \, x_{3} & = & 2 \\ 3 \, x_{1} & + & x_{2} & - & 4 \, x_{3} & = & 2 \\ -4 \, x_{1} & - & 2 \, x_{2} & + & 5 \, x_{3} & = & -2 \\ x_{1} & & & & & = & -2 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} 1 & 0 & -2 & 2 \\ 3 & 1 & -4 & 2 \\ -4 & -2 & 5 & -2 \\ 1 & 0 & 0 & -2 \end{array}\right)\]

exercises.pretext:

 \left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} 0 & -1 & -3 & -1 \\ 1 & 2 & 4 & 1 \\ 0 & 5 & 15 & 5 \\ 5 & 3 & -1 & -2 \end{array}\right)

\[\begin{matrix} 3 \, x & - & 3 \, y & + & 5 \, z & - & 8 \, {w} & = & 12 \\ -2 \, x & + & 2 \, y & - & 5 \, z & + & 7 \, {w} & = & -13 \\ 2 \, x & - & 2 \, y & + & 2 \, z & - & 4 \, {w} & = & 4 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} 3 & -3 & 5 & -8 & 12 \\ -2 & 2 & -5 & 7 & -13 \\ 2 & -2 & 2 & -4 & 4 \end{array}\right)\]

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} -3 \, x & + & y & + & 3 \, z & = & 9 \\ 2 \, x & - & 5 \, y & + & 11 \, z & = & -19 \\ 2 \, x & - & 2 \, y & + & 2 \, z & = & -10 \\ -x & + & 2 \, y & - & 4 \, z & = & 8 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} -3 & 1 & 3 & 9 \\ 2 & -5 & 11 & -19 \\ 2 & -2 & 2 & -10 \\ -1 & 2 & -4 & 8 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} -3 \, x & + & y & + & 3 \, z & = & 9 \\ 2 \, x & - & 5 \, y & + & 11 \, z & = & -19 \\ 2 \, x & - & 2 \, y & + & 2 \, z & = & -10 \\ -x & + & 2 \, y & - & 4 \, z & = & 8 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} -3 & 1 & 3 & 9 \\ 2 & -5 & 11 & -19 \\ 2 & -2 & 2 & -10 \\ -1 & 2 & -4 & 8 \end{array}\right)\]

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} x_{1} & + & 2 \, x_{2} & + & x_{3} & = & 2 \\ x_{1} & + & 2 \, x_{2} & - & 4 \, x_{3} & = & -13 \\ x_{1} & + & 2 \, x_{2} & - & x_{3} & = & -4 \\ & & & & 3 \, x_{3} & = & 9 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} 1 & 2 & 1 & 2 \\ 1 & 2 & -4 & -13 \\ 1 & 2 & -1 & -4 \\ 0 & 0 & 3 & 9 \end{array}\right)

exercises.pretext:

exercises.pretext:

exercises.pretext:

\begin{matrix} -2 \, x_{1} & - & 2 \, x_{2} & + & 3 \, x_{3} & = & 0 \\ -2 \, x_{1} & - & 2 \, x_{2} & + & x_{3} & = & -3 \\ x_{1} & + & x_{2} & - & x_{3} & = & 1 \\ -3 \, x_{1} & - & 3 \, x_{2} & + & x_{3} & = & -5 \\ \end{matrix}

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} x & + & 3 \, y & + & z & + & 2 \, {w} & = & 0 \\ 3 \, x & + & 9 \, y & + & 4 \, z & + & 6 \, {w} & = & 1 \\ 4 \, x & + & 12 \, y & & & + & 8 \, {w} & = & -4 \\ \end{matrix}

exercises.pretext:

\begin{matrix} x_{1} & + & 4 \, x_{2} & + & 14 \, x_{3} & + & 2 \, x_{4} & = & -3 \\ & & x_{2} & + & 3 \, x_{3} & + & x_{4} & = & -1 \\ -2 \, x_{1} & - & 3 \, x_{2} & - & 13 \, x_{3} & + & 2 \, x_{4} & = & 0 \\ \end{matrix}

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} -2 \, x_{1} & - & 3 \, x_{2} & + & 9 \, x_{3} & - & 6 \, x_{4} & = & -4 \\ x_{1} & - & 2 \, x_{2} & - & x_{3} & + & 3 \, x_{4} & = & -5 \\ x_{1} & & & - & 3 \, x_{3} & + & 3 \, x_{4} & = & -1 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} -2 & -3 & 9 & -6 & -4 \\ 1 & -2 & -1 & 3 & -5 \\ 1 & 0 & -3 & 3 & -1 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} -2 \, x_{1} & - & 3 \, x_{2} & + & 9 \, x_{3} & - & 6 \, x_{4} & = & -4 \\ x_{1} & - & 2 \, x_{2} & - & x_{3} & + & 3 \, x_{4} & = & -5 \\ x_{1} & & & - & 3 \, x_{3} & + & 3 \, x_{4} & = & -1 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} -2 & -3 & 9 & -6 & -4 \\ 1 & -2 & -1 & 3 & -5 \\ 1 & 0 & -3 & 3 & -1 \end{array}\right)\]

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} x & - & y & - & 4 \, z & + & 3 \, {w} & = & -4 \\ & & & & z & - & 2 \, {w} & = & 4 \\ & & & & & & {w} & = & -2 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} 1 & -1 & -4 & 3 & -4 \\ 0 & 0 & 1 & -2 & 4 \\ 0 & 0 & 0 & 1 & -2 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} x & - & y & - & 4 \, z & + & 3 \, {w} & = & -4 \\ & & & & z & - & 2 \, {w} & = & 4 \\ & & & & & & {w} & = & -2 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} x_{1} & - & x_{2} & - & 2 \, x_{3} & = & 7 \\ 2 \, x_{1} & - & 2 \, x_{2} & - & 3 \, x_{3} & = & 11 \\ -2 \, x_{1} & + & 2 \, x_{2} & + & 3 \, x_{3} & = & -11 \\ 4 \, x_{1} & - & 4 \, x_{2} & - & 4 \, x_{3} & = & 16 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} 1 & -1 & -2 & 7 \\ 2 & -2 & -3 & 11 \\ -2 & 2 & 3 & -11 \\ 4 & -4 & -4 & 16 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} x_{1} & - & x_{2} & - & 2 \, x_{3} & = & 7 \\ 2 \, x_{1} & - & 2 \, x_{2} & - & 3 \, x_{3} & = & 11 \\ -2 \, x_{1} & + & 2 \, x_{2} & + & 3 \, x_{3} & = & -11 \\ 4 \, x_{1} & - & 4 \, x_{2} & - & 4 \, x_{3} & = & 16 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} x_{1} & + & 2 \, x_{2} & + & 3 \, x_{3} & - & 4 \, x_{4} & = & 1 \\ x_{1} & + & 2 \, x_{2} & + & 3 \, x_{3} & - & 3 \, x_{4} & = & 1 \\ & & & & & & 4 \, x_{4} & = & 0 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} 1 & 2 & 3 & -4 & 1 \\ 1 & 2 & 3 & -3 & 1 \\ 0 & 0 & 0 & 4 & 0 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} x_{1} & + & 2 \, x_{2} & + & 3 \, x_{3} & - & 4 \, x_{4} & = & 1 \\ x_{1} & + & 2 \, x_{2} & + & 3 \, x_{3} & - & 3 \, x_{4} & = & 1 \\ & & & & & & 4 \, x_{4} & = & 0 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} 3 \, x & + & 3 \, y & - & 9 \, z & + & 4 \, {w} & = & 1 \\ & & & & & & {w} & = & 1 \\ 2 \, x & + & 2 \, y & - & 6 \, z & + & {w} & = & -1 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} 3 & 3 & -9 & 4 & 1 \\ 0 & 0 & 0 & 1 & 1 \\ 2 & 2 & -6 & 1 & -1 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} x_{1} & + & 3 \, x_{2} & - & 2 \, x_{3} & - & x_{4} & = & -3 \\ -4 \, x_{1} & - & 12 \, x_{2} & + & 8 \, x_{3} & + & 5 \, x_{4} & = & 12 \\ -5 \, x_{1} & - & 15 \, x_{2} & + & 10 \, x_{3} & + & x_{4} & = & 15 \\ \end{matrix}

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} x & + & y & + & 3 \, z & = & -6 \\ -2 \, x & - & y & - & 2 \, z & = & 0 \\ x & & & & & = & 3 \\ x & + & 2 \, y & + & 4 \, z & = & -9 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} 1 & 1 & 3 & -6 \\ -2 & -1 & -2 & 0 \\ 1 & 0 & 0 & 3 \\ 1 & 2 & 4 & -9 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} x & + & y & + & 3 \, z & = & -6 \\ -2 \, x & - & y & - & 2 \, z & = & 0 \\ x & & & & & = & 3 \\ x & + & 2 \, y & + & 4 \, z & = & -9 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} 1 & 1 & 3 & -6 \\ -2 & -1 & -2 & 0 \\ 1 & 0 & 0 & 3 \\ 1 & 2 & 4 & -9 \end{array}\right)\]

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} x_{1} & + & x_{2} & - & x_{3} & + & x_{4} & = & 4 \\ & & & & x_{3} & - & x_{4} & = & -3 \\ 2 \, x_{1} & + & 2 \, x_{2} & - & 4 \, x_{3} & + & 4 \, x_{4} & = & 14 \\ \end{matrix}

exercises.pretext:

exercises.pretext:

\begin{matrix} 2 \, x_{1} & + & 3 \, x_{2} & - & 12 \, x_{3} & = & -4 \\ -3 \, x_{1} & - & 2 \, x_{2} & + & 13 \, x_{3} & = & 2 \\ -x_{1} & & & + & 3 \, x_{3} & = & -1 \\ -x_{1} & - & 2 \, x_{2} & + & 7 \, x_{3} & = & 2 \\ \end{matrix}

 \left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} 2 & 3 & -12 & -4 \\ -3 & -2 & 13 & 2 \\ -1 & 0 & 3 & -1 \\ -1 & -2 & 7 & 2 \end{array}\right)

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} & - & 2 \, x_{2} & + & 2 \, x_{3} & = & 2 \\ x_{1} & - & 3 \, x_{2} & - & x_{3} & = & 5 \\ 2 \, x_{1} & - & 4 \, x_{2} & - & 3 \, x_{3} & = & 8 \\ x_{1} & - & 2 \, x_{2} & - & 2 \, x_{3} & = & 4 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} 0 & -2 & 2 & 2 \\ 1 & -3 & -1 & 5 \\ 2 & -4 & -3 & 8 \\ 1 & -2 & -2 & 4 \end{array}\right)

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} x & - & 2 \, y & - & z & = & 0 \\ -2 \, x & + & 4 \, y & + & 2 \, z & = & 1 \\ & & & & 0 & = & 0 \\ 4 \, x & - & 8 \, y & - & 4 \, z & = & 4 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} 1 & -2 & -1 & 0 \\ -2 & 4 & 2 & 1 \\ 0 & 0 & 0 & 0 \\ 4 & -8 & -4 & 4 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:

\[\begin{matrix} x_{1} & - & 2 \, x_{2} & + & 3 \, x_{3} & = & 1 \\ & & x_{2} & - & 5 \, x_{3} & = & 8 \\ & & & & x_{3} & = & -2 \\ & & & - & x_{3} & = & 2 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} 1 & -2 & 3 & 1 \\ 0 & 1 & -5 & 8 \\ 0 & 0 & 1 & -2 \\ 0 & 0 & -1 & 2 \end{array}\right)\]

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} -x_{1} & - & 2 \, x_{2} & - & 2 \, x_{3} & + & 4 \, x_{4} & = & -1 \\ x_{1} & + & x_{2} & - & x_{3} & + & 3 \, x_{4} & = & 2 \\ & & x_{2} & + & 4 \, x_{3} & - & 9 \, x_{4} & = & -2 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} -1 & -2 & -2 & 4 & -1 \\ 1 & 1 & -1 & 3 & 2 \\ 0 & 1 & 4 & -9 & -2 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} -x_{1} & - & 2 \, x_{2} & - & 2 \, x_{3} & + & 4 \, x_{4} & = & -1 \\ x_{1} & + & x_{2} & - & x_{3} & + & 3 \, x_{4} & = & 2 \\ & & x_{2} & + & 4 \, x_{3} & - & 9 \, x_{4} & = & -2 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} -1 & -2 & -2 & 4 & -1 \\ 1 & 1 & -1 & 3 & 2 \\ 0 & 1 & 4 & -9 & -2 \end{array}\right)\]

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} 4 \, x & - & 4 \, y & + & 4 \, z & = & -24 \\ -3 \, x & + & 3 \, y & - & 5 \, z & = & 24 \\ -3 \, x & + & 3 \, y & - & 2 \, z & = & 15 \\ -2 \, x & + & 2 \, y & - & 2 \, z & = & 12 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} 4 & -4 & 4 & -24 \\ -3 & 3 & -5 & 24 \\ -3 & 3 & -2 & 15 \\ -2 & 2 & -2 & 12 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} 4 \, x & - & 4 \, y & + & 4 \, z & = & -24 \\ -3 \, x & + & 3 \, y & - & 5 \, z & = & 24 \\ -3 \, x & + & 3 \, y & - & 2 \, z & = & 15 \\ -2 \, x & + & 2 \, y & - & 2 \, z & = & 12 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} 4 & -4 & 4 & -24 \\ -3 & 3 & -5 & 24 \\ -3 & 3 & -2 & 15 \\ -2 & 2 & -2 & 12 \end{array}\right)\]

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} -x & - & y & + & z & = & 0 \\ 2 \, x & + & 2 \, y & - & z & = & 4 \\ -2 \, x & - & 2 \, y & + & z & = & -3 \\ -2 \, x & - & 2 \, y & + & 2 \, z & = & -4 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} -1 & -1 & 1 & 0 \\ 2 & 2 & -1 & 4 \\ -2 & -2 & 1 & -3 \\ -2 & -2 & 2 & -4 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} -x & - & y & + & z & = & 0 \\ 2 \, x & + & 2 \, y & - & z & = & 4 \\ -2 \, x & - & 2 \, y & + & z & = & -3 \\ -2 \, x & - & 2 \, y & + & 2 \, z & = & -4 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} -1 & -1 & 1 & 0 \\ 2 & 2 & -1 & 4 \\ -2 & -2 & 1 & -3 \\ -2 & -2 & 2 & -4 \end{array}\right)\]

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} -2 \, x_{1} & + & 6 \, x_{2} & + & 2 \, x_{3} & - & 5 \, x_{4} & = & -7 \\ & & & & x_{3} & & & = & -2 \\ x_{1} & - & 3 \, x_{2} & + & x_{3} & + & 2 \, x_{4} & = & -1 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} -2 & 6 & 2 & -5 & -7 \\ 0 & 0 & 1 & 0 & -2 \\ 1 & -3 & 1 & 2 & -1 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} -2 \, x_{1} & + & 6 \, x_{2} & + & 2 \, x_{3} & - & 5 \, x_{4} & = & -7 \\ & & & & x_{3} & & & = & -2 \\ x_{1} & - & 3 \, x_{2} & + & x_{3} & + & 2 \, x_{4} & = & -1 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} -2 & 6 & 2 & -5 & -7 \\ 0 & 0 & 1 & 0 & -2 \\ 1 & -3 & 1 & 2 & -1 \end{array}\right)\]

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} x & + & 5 \, y & - & 14 \, z & + & 3 \, {w} & = & 10 \\ -x & - & 4 \, y & + & 11 \, z & - & 3 \, {w} & = & -9 \\ x & + & 4 \, y & - & 11 \, z & + & 4 \, {w} & = & 11 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} 1 & 5 & -14 & 3 & 10 \\ -1 & -4 & 11 & -3 & -9 \\ 1 & 4 & -11 & 4 & 11 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} x & + & 5 \, y & - & 14 \, z & + & 3 \, {w} & = & 10 \\ -x & - & 4 \, y & + & 11 \, z & - & 3 \, {w} & = & -9 \\ x & + & 4 \, y & - & 11 \, z & + & 4 \, {w} & = & 11 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} 1 & 5 & -14 & 3 & 10 \\ -1 & -4 & 11 & -3 & -9 \\ 1 & 4 & -11 & 4 & 11 \end{array}\right)\]

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} x_{1} & - & 2 \, x_{2} & - & 2 \, x_{3} & + & 2 \, x_{4} & = & -2 \\ -x_{1} & + & 2 \, x_{2} & + & 3 \, x_{3} & - & 3 \, x_{4} & = & 4 \\ -x_{1} & + & 2 \, x_{2} & + & x_{3} & - & x_{4} & = & 0 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} 1 & -2 & -2 & 2 & -2 \\ -1 & 2 & 3 & -3 & 4 \\ -1 & 2 & 1 & -1 & 0 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} x_{1} & - & 2 \, x_{2} & - & 2 \, x_{3} & + & 2 \, x_{4} & = & -2 \\ -x_{1} & + & 2 \, x_{2} & + & 3 \, x_{3} & - & 3 \, x_{4} & = & 4 \\ -x_{1} & + & 2 \, x_{2} & + & x_{3} & - & x_{4} & = & 0 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} 1 & -2 & -2 & 2 & -2 \\ -1 & 2 & 3 & -3 & 4 \\ -1 & 2 & 1 & -1 & 0 \end{array}\right)\]

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} & & & & 0 & = & 1 \\ -x & + & 3 \, y & - & 3 \, z & = & 3 \\ & & & & 0 & = & 4 \\ -4 \, x & + & 12 \, y & - & 12 \, z & = & 4 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} 0 & 0 & 0 & 1 \\ -1 & 3 & -3 & 3 \\ 0 & 0 & 0 & 4 \\ -4 & 12 & -12 & 4 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} & & & & 0 & = & 1 \\ -x & + & 3 \, y & - & 3 \, z & = & 3 \\ & & & & 0 & = & 4 \\ -4 \, x & + & 12 \, y & - & 12 \, z & = & 4 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} 0 & 0 & 0 & 1 \\ -1 & 3 & -3 & 3 \\ 0 & 0 & 0 & 4 \\ -4 & 12 & -12 & 4 \end{array}\right)\]

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} x & - & 3 \, y & & & = & -4 \\ 2 \, x & - & 6 \, y & + & z & = & -4 \\ -2 \, x & + & 6 \, y & - & z & = & 5 \\ & & & & 0 & = & -5 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} 1 & -3 & 0 & -4 \\ 2 & -6 & 1 & -4 \\ -2 & 6 & -1 & 5 \\ 0 & 0 & 0 & -5 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} x & - & 3 \, y & & & = & -4 \\ 2 \, x & - & 6 \, y & + & z & = & -4 \\ -2 \, x & + & 6 \, y & - & z & = & 5 \\ & & & & 0 & = & -5 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} 1 & -3 & 0 & -4 \\ 2 & -6 & 1 & -4 \\ -2 & 6 & -1 & 5 \\ 0 & 0 & 0 & -5 \end{array}\right)\]

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} x & + & y & + & z & - & 3 \, {w} & = & -7 \\ -2 \, x & - & y & - & 3 \, z & + & 4 \, {w} & = & 10 \\ x & & & + & 2 \, z & & & = & 0 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} 1 & 1 & 1 & -3 & -7 \\ -2 & -1 & -3 & 4 & 10 \\ 1 & 0 & 2 & 0 & 0 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} x & + & y & + & z & - & 3 \, {w} & = & -7 \\ -2 \, x & - & y & - & 3 \, z & + & 4 \, {w} & = & 10 \\ x & & & + & 2 \, z & & & = & 0 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} 1 & 1 & 1 & -3 & -7 \\ -2 & -1 & -3 & 4 & 10 \\ 1 & 0 & 2 & 0 & 0 \end{array}\right)\]

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} -2 \, x & + & 2 \, y & - & 2 \, z & = & -1 \\ -x & + & y & - & z & = & -4 \\ -x & + & y & - & z & = & -2 \\ & & & & 0 & = & -3 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} -2 & 2 & -2 & -1 \\ -1 & 1 & -1 & -4 \\ -1 & 1 & -1 & -2 \\ 0 & 0 & 0 & -3 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} -2 \, x & + & 2 \, y & - & 2 \, z & = & -1 \\ -x & + & y & - & z & = & -4 \\ -x & + & y & - & z & = & -2 \\ & & & & 0 & = & -3 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrr|r} -2 & 2 & -2 & -1 \\ -1 & 1 & -1 & -4 \\ -1 & 1 & -1 & -2 \\ 0 & 0 & 0 & -3 \end{array}\right)\]

exercises.pretext:
Consider the following system of equations:

\begin{matrix} -2 \, x_{1} & + & 4 \, x_{2} & - & 2 \, x_{3} & - & 12 \, x_{4} & = & 10 \\ -2 \, x_{1} & + & 4 \, x_{2} & - & 5 \, x_{3} & - & 21 \, x_{4} & = & 16 \\ -3 \, x_{1} & + & 6 \, x_{2} & - & 5 \, x_{3} & - & 24 \, x_{4} & = & 19 \\ \end{matrix}

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

 \left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} -2 & 4 & -2 & -12 & 10 \\ -2 & 4 & -5 & -21 & 16 \\ -3 & 6 & -5 & -24 & 19 \end{array}\right)
exercises.html:
Consider the following system of equations:

\[\begin{matrix} -2 \, x_{1} & + & 4 \, x_{2} & - & 2 \, x_{3} & - & 12 \, x_{4} & = & 10 \\ -2 \, x_{1} & + & 4 \, x_{2} & - & 5 \, x_{3} & - & 21 \, x_{4} & = & 16 \\ -3 \, x_{1} & + & 6 \, x_{2} & - & 5 \, x_{3} & - & 24 \, x_{4} & = & 19 \\ \end{matrix}\]

Write an augmented matrix corresponding to this system.

Answer:

\[\left(\begin{array}{rrrr|r} -2 & 4 & -2 & -12 & 10 \\ -2 & 4 & -5 & -21 & 16 \\ -3 & 6 & -5 & -24 & 19 \end{array}\right)\]

exercises.pretext:
Determine if each of the following piecewise functions is continuous.

  1. l(x) = \begin{cases} x - 3 & x \leq 0 \\ 5 \, x - 3 & x > 0 \\ \end{cases}

  2. k(x) = \begin{cases} -2 \, x + 6 & x \leq 0 \\ -5 \, x + 9 & x > 0 \\ \end{cases}

  1. Yes

  2. No
exercises.html:
Determine if each of the following piecewise functions is continuous.

  1. \[ l(x) = \begin{cases} x - 3 & x \leq 0 \\ 5 \, x - 3 & x > 0 \\ \end{cases} \]

  2. \[ k(x) = \begin{cases} -2 \, x + 6 & x \leq 0 \\ -5 \, x + 9 & x > 0 \\ \end{cases} \]

Answer:

  1. Yes

  2. No

exercises.pretext:

  1. \[ h(x) = \begin{cases} -6 \, x + 7 & x \leq 0 \\ 4 \, x + 7 & x > 0 \\ \end{cases} \]

  2. \[ k(x) = \begin{cases} -3 \, x + 2 & x \leq 0 \\ 6 \, x - 8 & x > 0 \\ \end{cases} \]

Answer:

  1. Yes

  2. No

  2. k(x) = \begin{cases} x - 3 & x \leq 0 \\ -6 \, x + 6 & x > 0 \\ \end{cases}

  1. Yes

  2. No

  2. \[ k(x) = \begin{cases} x - 3 & x \leq 0 \\ -6 \, x + 6 & x > 0 \\ \end{cases} \]

Answer:

  1. Yes
